content: processing data for synthetic data generation and the fine-tuning process. Figure 5-10 The ilab flow of commands Before you begin working with ilab, ensure that your system meets the following requirements:  Operating system: Linux (tested on Fedora), or macOS with Apple M1/M2/M3 chipsets.  Disk space: Minimum of 250 GB. 500 GB is recommended for complete workflows.  Python Version 3.10 or 3.11. At the time of writing, Python 3.12+ is unsupported due to dependency constraints.  C++ compiler: Ensure that a modern GCC version or equivalent is installed. If you use Python environment management tools, ensure that they build libraries that are implemented in C by including flags during Python compilation. For example, when using pyenv, you use the following string: PYTHON_CONFIGURE_OPTS="--enable-framework" pyenv install 3.11.5 Chapter 5. Advanced capabilities of watsonx.ai 73 To install the required tools, run the following command: sudo dnf install gcc gcc-c++ make git python3.11
